sections.heading: Defendant's costs; when allowed
sections.text: Costs shall be allowed of course to any defendant upon a judgment in his favor in the actions mentioned in section 25-1708.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 622, p. 504;R.S.1913, § 8169;C.S.1922, § 9120;C.S.1929, § 20-1710;R.S.1943, § 25-1710.AnnotationsSection recognizes common

sections.heading: common law precept. Keller v. State, 184 Neb. 853, 172 N.W.2d 782 (1969).
sections.text: common law precept. Keller v. State, 184 Neb. 853, 172 N.W.2d 782 (1969).
